metadata.title: CVE-2019-20165 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0 and0.9.0-development-20191109. There is a NULL pointer dereference in thefunction ilst_item_Read() in isomedia/box_code_apple.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac10 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gpac package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
